hero.title: Building Technology
hero.subtitle: HUA Labs is a company that researches and develops interfaces that understand and empathize with users' emotions. We create better digital experiences through the balance of technology and emotion.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Our mission is to understand people's emotions through technology and provide warmer digital experiences based on that understanding.
mission.description2: Through the combination of AI and UX, we identify users' emotional states and provide appropriate interfaces and content. We believe technology doesn't have to be cold.

userCentric.title: User-Centered
userCentric.description: All decisions are based on user experience.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We solve problems in new ways and create value.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We understand and empathize with people beyond technology.

execution.title: Execution
execution.description: We quickly realize ideas and improve them.

team.title: Small but Strong Team
team.description1: HUA Labs is a small team passionate about emotion AI, UX design, and frontend development. We work together toward one goal, leveraging each other's expertise.
team.description2: We are looking for colleagues to grow with. If you're interested, please contact us anytime.
